summary: A motley crew of treasure hunters plan to rob the cruise-liner RMS Queen Mary, using a recovered WW2 German submarine.
cast: Frank Sinatra|Virna Lisi|Anthony Franciosa|Richard Conte|Alf Kjellin|Errol John|Murray Matheson|Reginald Denny|John Warburton|Lester Matthews|Val Avery|Gilchrist Stuart|Ronald Long|Leslie Bradley|Arthur Gould-Porter|Frank Baker|Alan Baxter|Laurence Conroy|Walt Davis|Douglas Deane|Noel Drayton|Bob Hoy|Ray Kellogg|Donald Lawton|Barbara Morrison|Jack Raine|Robert Shawley
keywords: gold robbery|beer|underwater scene|queen mary the ocean liner|queen mary ship
title: Asalto al Queen Mary
